issue.title: [Rust] Auto-label PRs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10156](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10156). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Auto-label PRs on github so that we do not have to label them ourselves.

The decision should be based on the code that changed, and not only on the title.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10156?focusedCommentId=17208002) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8324
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8324>
